The Catholic archdiocese in Anchorage, Alaska says it will take a close look at possible sexual abuse within the church Alaska Public media's Abbie columns reports on the steps being taken
The church is appointing an independent commission to review files from the last fifty years archbishop ... H ... says the investigation will look into how sexual abuse accusations have been handled
We are taking care of business and we're taking care of victims

Agent says the current review was not prompted by new allegations in Alaska but instead the climate throughout the country and recent revelations in other states

Pay ten says he's tired of people in other countries paying less than Americans for prescription drugs
